title: Grim Dawn

Description
Grim Dawn is a spiritual heir of Titan Quest, which is created by the efforts of a young Studio Crate Entertainment founded by natives of Iron Lore Entertainment. The game is an action/RPG made in fantasy style. The action of the plot of the Grim Dawn takes place in Empire Cairn, which has become a battleground for two of supernatural forces. One is going to use people as a resource, the second is planning to exterminate the species homo sapiens, that it did not got to the enemy. The remnants of humanity are hiding in shelters and observe the confrontation. Iron has replaced the gold coins and salt became so valuable weapon that it ceased to add to your food. People now have hope: some survivors have gained supernatural spoosbnosti, that will repel the invaders
